args.natural_language_statement: Prove that if z ∈ ℂ, then |cos z| ≤ cosh(Im z). Translate this statement into Lean4 (Mathlib) code, importing Mathlib at the top. End the Lean4 statement with := by sorry.

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-!
Prove that for z : ℂ, |cos z| ≤ cosh (Im z).
-/

theorem complex.abs_cos_le_cosh_im (z : ℂ) : Complex.abs (Complex.cos z) ≤ Real.cosh (Complex.im z) := by sorry
